questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of the packaged product as visually apparent?

What is the visible style of the printed text on the packaging (e.g., font, size)?
What does the visible nutritional information seem to relate to (e.g., food item, drink)?
Describe the visual clarity of the label on the package.
What is the dominant design characteristic of the overall packaging?
What is the visible material of the inner container (if present)?
